title: Here Today, Gone to Maui
description: Fennec I can get through a weeklong vacation without falling for my former Daddy…right?Sign up for this free vacation giveaway, my brother said. It will be great, he said.Except now I’m stuck in Hawaii with the Daddy who broke my heart. Three years ago I pulled up my big boy pants and let Daddy go away to live his dream. Now, what was supposed to be my break from reality has become the reminder of the worst thing that ever happened to me. My fat thumbs and tiny phone screen will rue the day they mistook my choice of Greece for Hawaii.
author: Jamie Luther
